## Commercially Available IT Training Services
### Summary

This notice aims to solicit proposals for Commercially Available IT Training Services for Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC). This requirement will be satisfied through the use of the CAITTS Supply Arrangement (SA) method of supply.

### Background

This solicitation follows an Amendment to extend the closing date to September 27, 2022. The Supply Arrangement (SA) ICT / IT Training is for Services administered by Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC).

### Introduction

This request for proposal intends to result in the award of one contract per Workstream. Each contract will be for a period from Contract award date to March 31, 2023, with two additional irrevocable option periods to extend the contract terms. The notice is open to PWGSC CAITTS SA Suppliers, invitations have been sent to the following Suppliers:

1112076 Ontario LTD (operating as Micro Market Business centre)
Algonquin College
Choquette Technology Associates (operating under SECT Training)
Compuease Inc.
Eliquo Training & Development Incorporated
Global Knowledge Network Canada Inc.
Groupe Edgenda Inc. (Formerly known as AFI Expertise)
JN Software Consulting
Learning Tree International
Lighthouse Lab Inc
Noble Prog
Priority Learning and Development
Protech Training
S.T.C.G. The Standford (Priority Management)
StormWind LLC
Technologia
Ultimate IT Courses
Versalys Inc

### Contract Award

A contract will be awarded to a PWGSC CAITTS SA Supplier who best meets the requirements for one or more Workstreams. The contract will be administered by Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC).

### Notice of Amendment

This is an Amendment Notice to advertise an update to the closing date of already advertised solicitation. Amendment #1 extends the closing date from September 14, 2021 (14:00 EDT) to September 27, 2022 (14:00 EDT).

### Contact Information

For any queries or information, please contact:
Ekaterina Suvorova
EC-SOLICITATIONS-GD@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca

Important Information
* Only PWGSC CAITTS SA Suppliers may participate in this solicitation.
* This procurement is open to Canadian businesses.
* Deadlines and timelines are firm.
* Suppliers must review the contract terms and requirements carefully before responding to this solicitation. 
The Supply Arr
